name: Lucky Night: Texas Hold'em VR
description:
**********VR ONLY!!!Requires a virtual reality headset!!!**********
Enjoy the most free and lucky poker game night.

Lucky Night: Texas Hold’em is a VR multiplayer online poker game. Come and enjoy the most impressive Texas hold’em game in virtual room with real players by HTC Vive or Oculus Rift. Grab and play the chips and cards like a poker master.

Key Features:● Simple and natural controlsInteract with the chips and cards by motion controllers, just like playing a real poker game. It’s very easy to see the cards, raise the bet, check, call and fold.● Exciting poker gamesAllow at most 6 players play together. Observe competitors’ actions, and guess their strategies to earn more chips. Watch the live on the big screen to get more information of the current game.● A variety of expressionSend the emoji to others, to express your happiness, surprise, anger and disappointment. Show a very different yourself in VR world.● Customizable Avatar Many kinds of hair styles, clothing, shoes and accessories are available. Grab what you like and cast to your body to change to new style.
